## FEAT-0050: One-click Install Script

## Objective

Provide a simple shell script to automate the setup of the Monoco Toolkit development environment.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] `scripts/install.sh` exists.
- [ ] Script handles venv creation/activation.
- [ ] Script installs the package in editable mode.

## Technical Tasks

- [ ] Write `scripts/install.sh`.
- [ ] Make script executable.
